metadata.title: Wednesday, 26th November, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when a permanent barracks will be constructed in Chimbamilonga Parliamentary Constituency to enhance security; and
(b)    when the Government will procure a sub-marine for use on Lake Tanganyika.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    when construction of Kasanjiku Mini-Hydro Power project in the North-Western Province will be completed and commissioned;
(b)    what the construction time-frame of the project is; and

(c)    who the prime beneficiaries of the project are. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 44/01: under consideration): (Mr Livune).
